tasks.title: Design Homepage Layout
tasks.description: Create the initial design for the homepage, focusing on the bakery's branding, featured products, and navigation to other sections.

tasks.title: Develop Photo Gallery
tasks.description: Create an attractive and responsive photo gallery to showcase the bakery's products and events.

tasks.title: Research Payment Gateways
tasks.description: Investigate and compare different payment gateways for integrating an online ordering system.

tasks.title: Prepare Legal Pages
tasks.description: Draft the terms and conditions, privacy policy, and other legal pages required for the website.

tasks.title: Implement Homepage Features
tasks.description: Develop the main features for the homepage, including the product carousel, featured items, and special announcements.

tasks.title: Revise Legal Documents
tasks.description: Review and update the legal documents, ensuring they are comprehensive and comply with the latest regulations.
comments: Privacy policy update for new data protection laws

tasks.title: Review Homepage Design
tasks.description: Conduct a detailed review of the homepage design to ensure it aligns with the bakery's brand and user experience standards.

tasks.title: Content Proofreading for About Us Page
tasks.description: Proofread the About Us page content for grammatical errors, readability, and brand alignment.
comments: Ensure the tone is friendly and welcoming

tasks.title: Evaluate Blog Post Quality
tasks.description: Review the first series of blog posts for engaging content, accuracy, and alignment with the marketing strategy.
comments: Check for consistency in writing style

tasks.title: SEO Strategy Feedback
tasks.description: Provide feedback on the implemented SEO strategy, analyzing its effectiveness and identifying areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Test Menu Interactivity
tasks.description: Test the interactive elements of the online menu for functionality, user experience, and responsiveness.
comments: Check on various devices and browsers
Gather user feedback on ease of use

tasks.title: Analyze Analytics Implementation
tasks.description: Review the setup and data from the web analytics tools to ensure accurate tracking and meaningful insights.
comments: Verify tracking codes on all pages

tasks.title: Contact Page Usability Testing
tasks.description: Perform usability testing on the contact page to assess the user experience, form functionality, and overall design.
comments: Prepare a set of tasks and questions

tasks.title: Gallery Performance Review
tasks.description: Evaluate the performance and loading times of the photo gallery, ensuring optimal speed and user engagement.

tasks.title: Payment Gateway Security Assessment
tasks.description: Assess the security measures of the selected payment gateway, ensuring it meets industry standards and protects customer data.

tasks.title: Finalize Legal Document Revisions
tasks.description: Review the revised legal documents one last time to ensure accuracy and compliance before publishing.
comments: Consult with legal one more time

tasks.title: Launch Bakery Website
tasks.description: Successfully launched the new bakery website with full functionality, including the online menu, blog, and contact form.

tasks.title: Complete First Month SEO Analysis
tasks.description: Analyzed the website's SEO performance for the first month, tracking keyword rankings, traffic, and user engagement.

tasks.title: Finalize User Feedback Survey
tasks.description: Developed and released a user feedback survey to gather insights on the new website's performance and areas for improvement.
